text: A general's presence and strength of character; their ability to lead and to govern.
A general's willpower and heart; their commitment to the fight and to the people.
A general's wisdom and wit; their gift for scheming and strategising.
A general's audacity and drive; their fervour in battle and in statecraft.
A general's proficiency and craft; their mastery of both martial and cultural arts.
